February 1, 2025

Finished My Website Pricing Tool

Today I finished making the website pricing tool I had been working on for a couple of weeks now.

Above are the icons that I designed for the tool.

Use This Tool Live

If you want to see this tool live please consider.

My Goal With This Project

My goal with this project is to help people get a better understanding of the price of a website.

About This Tool

the calculator is a simple 4 question answer though if this gets a lot of downloads and I get some donations I will be adding significantly more features and customization.
